text: Google's Motorola units has launched a
low-cost smartphone offering features
more commonly found in higher priced
models the Moto G will be sold contract
free for 135 pounds in the UK and 179
dollars in the US the handset has a
four-and-a-half inch high-definition
screen a 5 megapixel camera and runs the
latest version of Android analysts
predicts the budget end of the
smartphone market is set to enjoy huge
growth Facebook has moved to protect
users it suspects have been compromised
by the recent theft of millions of Adobe
logins any members of the social network
who've used the same email and password
combinations for facebook and adobe
accounts are at risk any affected users
must answer additional security
questions in order to access their
facebook accounts Twitter has announced
a new way for users to curate and share
their own themed tweet streams with the
new feature users can create name and
specifically choose tweets they wish to
add to their custom timeline this new
approach should allow for more order
amid the chaos that can sometimes arise
on the micro-blogging site particularly
for those like news organizations
wanting to curate tweets relating to
live events and from teen idol to wanna
beat tech idol justin bieber pop star
who first made it big via youtube is
bankrolling a selfie centric photo
sharing network the canadian pop
performer is such a fever in the shots
of me app he's thrown 1 million dollars
into the investment pot in an attempt to
capitalize on his enormous fan base the
singer hopes to establish a new platform
to promote the self portrait trend
